attributes.action: make children's prices always be for those of 18 and under.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently "child" the age restrictions on being a child differ massively. For instance a "child" in a restaurantmay  be 12 and under, whereas on a bus it is 14 and under.

The term "child" refers to those under the age of 18 and therefore it should be law that a "childs" price should be for those 18 and under.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
